title: How to report an accont thats boosting?
body: Ik i cant say names or post links to anyones op.gg without permission but i just played against a guy who is obviasly boosting (even admited it to me in dms just as im writing this....) i looked at his op.gg to find hes on a 5 game win streak with reksai (never played her or jg before this) and has amazing kdas so just so riot can investigate how do i report this?

replies.body: The first and preferred way to report someone is by using the in-game report function in the post-game lobby. If that's not possible, or you feel it isn't enough for the situation at hand, the best way to report someone is by submitting a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Including screenshots, links, videos etc that are relevant to the case will help the process move along as well.
